Cookie Policy

Cookies are small text files that will be installed by our site on your computer, they will allow us to provide certain functions on our site, such as the ability to log in or remember certain preferences.

Rights

You have the right to access or obtain a copy of the personal data we have about you. To do this, contact us. If you believe that the information we have about you is incomplete or inaccurate, then you can ask us to supplement or correct this information.

You also have the right to request the deletion of your personal data. Please contact us if you want us to delete your personal data.

Policy adoption

Continued use of our site means your full consent to this policy. If you do not agree with our policy, then please do not use this site. When registering, we will also request your explicit consent to the privacy Policy.

Policy changes

We may make changes to this policy at any time. You may be asked to review and re-accept the information in this policy if it changes in the future.
